scripts.start:python: cmd /c "cd services && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && python App.py"
scripts.start:python:prod: cmd /c "cd services && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && set FLASK_DEBUG=False && python App.py"
scripts.start:separate: echo 'Run these commands in separate terminals: npm run start:next && npm run start:python:prod'
scripts.env:setup: npm run env:copy && cd services && npm run env:copy
scripts.env:check: node -e "console.log('Frontend PORT:', process.env.PORT); console.log('API URL:', process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL);"
scripts.dev:full: npm run env:setup && npm run dev
scripts.start:dev: npm run kill:ports && npm run dev
scripts.seeder: cmd /c "cd services && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && python Seeder.py"
scripts.delete: cmd /c "cd services && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && python DeleteData.py"
scripts.delete:products: cmd /c "cd services && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && python DeleteData.py --products"
scripts.delete:history: cmd /c "cd services && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && python DeleteData.py --history"
scripts.reinstall:windows: rmdir /s /q node_modules & del package-lock.json & del pnpm-lock.yaml & npm install
scripts.reinstall:linux: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json pnpm-lock.yaml && npm install
